messageText:
Hello Dear valued user! A new version (v1.02.36) of the Invoice Maker application is now available.
You are currently using (v1.02.35), please update now by clicking the (Download) button below.
[ What are the performance and features ]
• Create Invoice with well-designed templates [added]
• Real-time preview during invoices & estimates creation [added]
• Discount Option modified to advanced fee selection [fixed]
• Completely Fixed all errors and bugs [fixed]
